name: Cnidarian Solitaire
description:
Cnidarian Solitaire is an old-school desktop solitaire game, using a custom 78-card deck inspired by old-school Marseilles tarot decks.

  • Free up cards and stack them in piles.
  • Experience the live-changing calm of sorting a deck of cards, into piles.
  • A unique Tarot deck featuring Victorian biological illustrations.
  • 78 cards means 33% more solitaire.
  • Engage in Time Theft by playing solitaire at work.
  • Waste even more time reading the Taropedia, an unconventional guide to all 21 Major Arcana.
